sentences.literal: Tu Wei Zhi Xu third year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘三，小餘一百九十五；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder three, small remainder one hundred ninety five;
Large remainder eighteen, small remainder twenty four;
Zhu Li Da Mang Luo fourth year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘五十七，小餘五百四十三；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder fifty seven, small remainder five hundred forty three;
Large remainder twenty four, no small remainder;
Shang Heng Dun Zang Hou Yuan first year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘二十一，小餘四百五十；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder twenty one, small remainder four hundred fifty;
Large remainder twenty nine, small remainder eight;
Zhao Yang Zhi Qiao second year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘十五，小餘七百九十八；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder fifteen, small remainder seven hundred ninety eight;
Large remainder thirty four, small remainder sixteen;
Heng Ai Dun Tan Shi Yuan first year.

sentences.chinese: 正西十二大餘三十九，小餘七百五；
sentences.literal: West twelve large remainder thirty nine, small remainder seven hundred five;

sentences.chinese: 大餘三十九，小餘二十四；
sentences.literal: Large remainder thirty nine, small remainder twenty four;
